A4.text: Ron Rivera held the position from 2011 to 2019 and led the team to four playoff appearances including Super Bowl 50.

A5.text: Dom Capers was the head coach from 1995 to 1998 and led the team to one playoff appearance.

A6.text: On January 11, 2011, Rivera was hired to become the fourth head coach of the Carolina Panthers.

A7.text: After a 5â€“7 start to the 2019 season, Rivera was fired on December 3, 2019, after nine seasons as head coach.
